tags: I am not sorry for this
summary: Team Death match!!   ---------------   Hey! I wanted to see Kirishima being in constant supervision, so here I am, with this...
caption:
Team Death match!! 

 ————— 

 Hey! I wanted to see Kirishima being in constant supervision, so here I am, with this stupid parody of one of my favorite parodies but now with my dumbases future heroes, yay. 

 I need someone who avoid me from using the computer. (?) I am so sorry! 

The head behind all the dialogues is this amazing (and dead (?)) man: https://www.youtube.com/user/purpleey…

And the original series is Code Ment: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=miP21… 

You can see this little shit in YT: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CgmGHpwRshs

 I don’t own any dialogue or My Hero Academia, the second one is property of Hori and Bones and I´m only using it for fun.

[Kaminari Denki - Boku no Hero Academia]

blog.name: tobobio
blog.title: Bakubros
blog.description: i write Bakugou x reader scenarios. Ask box: CLOSED I try to post everyday. Art blog: momobuta

summary: His Tyranny [Bakugou x Reader Fantasy AU] Pt. 10
title: His Tyranny [Bakugou x Reader Fantasy AU] Pt. 10
body:
“Alright everyone listen up!”

Bakugou slammed his hands on the long wooden table. All the servants, including yourself, had gathered into Bakugou’s conference room. You were all seated along the length of the table with the exception of Bakugou who was standing at the front. A large map showing the expanse of all 4 kingdoms spread across the wall in the front of the room.

“We’ll be discussing our plan of action for when we take down The All Mighty King. I have gathered most of our materials, such as the potions and tools for our men. The last of the items we need are currently being produced at the factories and will be ready in about a week or two depending how fast those dipshits work.”

‘He’s still rude even when talking about something important…gross…’

To be honest you really didn’t want to be there. But as you were the very important aspect – pretty much the main aspect – for his grand plan to succeed. You had no other choice but to attend and do what you were quite stubborn at. Listening.

Everyone else was sitting very quietly, very attentive and absorbing every word that came out of the king’s mouth. So you saw it best to do the same. For now at least.

“Once we have all our supplies, we gather all our men, arm ourselves and the dragons. We will move in 3 units. Each unit armed with 3 dragons and 20 men.”

He pins the map with a large blue button, right on the Ugajin Kingdom, another yellow button over Suijin Kingdom and a red one over Fujin Kingdom, “One unit will head west to Ugajin Kingdom and another east to Suijin Kingdom. They both have an alliance with The All Mighty King, so they would most likely try to come to the All Mighty King’s aid if anything were to happen, so you will act as a decoy to keep them from coming towards Fujin Kingdom.”

Pointing to the red button, “I will be in the main unit going towards Fujin Kingdom to face The All Mighty King and bring him to his downfall. Now I’ll be assigning the leaders of each unit so if you’re chosen. You better not fuck it up.”

You gulped. You knew you were most likely, no way in hell, not going to be chosen for such a position because Bakugou needed your power. But you felt nervousness for the rest of the men in the room. No one wanted to be assigned such a high and trustworthy position, especially if it were for Bakugou’s fleet. The pressure of having to do so well was unnerving and made the inexperienced servants scared out of their lives.

Bakugou glowered at the men, studying each and everyone of their faces. Deciding just by looks and by pure opinion who would be most suited for the job.

“The Ugajin fleet… (y/n)’s dear friend will lead.”

Your dear friend?…. Bernard!?
Your eyes widened and you turned to your friend seated next to you. He was just as shocked as you were. His eyes were saucers and his mouth opened and closed but no words came out.

“Wait-” But Bakugou was quick to interrupt you. He knew you were bound to say something and he knew exactly how to counter you.

“Bernard here, volunteered himself as a lead position if one were ever needed. And my decision is final. No take backs.”

“But-”

“Thank you so much your majesty!” your head snapped back to your friend. Bernard bowed down to a 90 degree angle, and a smile plastered on his face. “I’ll do my best!”

Surprised would be an understatement to the announcement and to such a bold move that your timid – or once timid – friend had just pulled. You were absolutely astonished. But instead of retaliating, you accepted your friend’s decision and gave him a congratulatory pat on the back as he sat back down.

“Moving along, the lead for the Suijin fleet will be Commander Dunceface.”

‘Commander Dunceface?’

Said man seemed to irritate the blonde as his eye slightly twitched and his face furrowed into a deeper scowl at the sound of his name rolling off his tongue. You had no idea of whom this ‘dunceface’ was and your curiosity was piqued once again to whomever it could be. Such an odd name it was.

“Of course I’ll be leading the Fujin fleet. (y/n), you will be coming with me. Their army there is much stronger and with your power our strength is nearly, if not completely, unstoppable.”

You nod, already apprehended the logistics that you were basically just Bakugou’s war weapon since the day he swooped in through your window.

“The rest of you will be in charge of preparing the gear and making sure that all the equipment are in good condition with no defaults. As well as the dragons. They should be extremely healthy and tip top shape. We can’t afford to have any faults.” Bakugou spoke with such a strong tone the whole meeting. It was something much different than when he talked casually. Every word that came out of his mouth and the combination of the complete seriousness in his voice, made him seem like a whole different person. It wasn’t the usual hot-headed, short tempered, foul mouthed brute you, or pretty much anyone else, knew. This was the actual King of Kojin, Bakugou Katsuki.

This new sophisticated way of speaking really caught your attention and made it more enticing to listen. It made you feel like you actually wanted to listen.

“When we have all the preparations, all you servants and the men of the army working in the factories will get into your fleets and take action simultaneously. That way if a kingdom that tries to aid another won’t overlap and outnumber a fleet. So it’s crucial that there be no delays.”

Bakugou’s gaze scans over each face in the room once again. His crimson eyes burning into each soul, along with the last words that embedded itself into everyone’s mind.

“This is a very important battle. A war for power. Kojin Kingdom will rise to the top and we will be victorious.”

~

“Men we know what is at stake, and we will do everything in our power to save (y/n)”

Your father paced back and forth at the front of the large conference room of the (l/n) House. His men, consisting of most of your older male relatives as well as your elder brother, lined up in front of him giving the man of the house their undivided attention.

“What we’ve gathered so far is that she has been taken by Bakugou Katsuki, the King of Kojin. As what we can assume, he was the one Mandell witnessed kidnapping (y/n) from her tower and riding off on his dragon.”

There was a large map of all 4 kingdoms, much identical to Bakugou’s, laid out on a table.

“They were reported last seen here in Fujin Kingdom in the town of Ava.” pointing to a southeast area of the Fujin Kingdom. “The King of Kojin must’ve taken her back to his castle. But he may have had other plans and could have hidden her elsewhere.”

“So what do you suggest we do uncle?” a taller man presumed as your cousin spoke.

“Before we jump to any conclusions, we will take it slow. We know what the King of Kojin is capable of and won’t hesitate to kill. He may threaten to kill (y/n)”

“But father-!”

“I know son. I want to get her back as soon as possible. But please just bear it. Bear with me.”

He took a deep breath, straightening his back and looking into each of the eyes of his men. “I’ve already devised part of our plan. First we will need to confirm if she is being held at the castle or not.”

“And how will we do that brother?” your uncle spoke.

“We will have a spy. One of you will go undercover and stalk their whereabouts. You will sneak to their castle and follow them throughout the day. And report back here about their actions and where (y/n) is being held.”

“So who will be the one to do that?” another quered.

“I will leave that job to (e/b/n).” facing his son. Your brother nods, “I will do my best father.”

“Once we confirm her location, I will contact the All Mighty King for aid.”

“The All Mighty King? Isn’t that aiming a little too high brother? What do you intend on having the All Mighty King for?”

“We will ambush the King of Kojin.”

Since hearing that you were with the King of Kojin, your father’s blood was boiling for days on end. He absolutely hated Bakugou. And that hatred burned deeper than the depths of hell when he somehow got his hands on his dear daughter. His mind flooded with negative thoughts on what in gods world he could be doing to you. The fear of his pure innocent daughter being tainted by that murderous savage loomed over him, and all he could feel was rage and desperation. He would go as far to kill, if it meant getting his daughter back.

He wanted to kill Bakugou Katsuki.

“We will do anything to get (y/n) back.

We’re going to kill the King of Kojin.”

heh so what did you think? writing this chapter was pretty enjoyable because of serious Bakugou. im thinking of doing those february prompts but we’ll see. my birthday was weird and lonely but at least i ate pho.

taglist: @lovecakebacon @spookyscaryskjei @sciencethatshit @seleniumlovelevi

“Once we have all our supplies, we gather all our men, arm ourselves and the dragons. We will move in 3 units. Each unit armed with 3 dragons and 20 men.”

He pins the map with a large blue button, right on the Ugajin Kingdom, another yellow button over Suijin Kingdom and a red one over Fujin Kingdom, “One unit will head west to Ugajin Kingdom and another east to Suijin Kingdom. They both have an alliance with The All Mighty King, so they would most likely try to come to the All Mighty King’s aid if anything were to happen, so you will act as a decoy to keep them from coming towards Fujin Kingdom.”

Pointing to the red button, “I will be in the main unit going towards Fujin Kingdom to face The All Mighty King and bring him to his downfall. Now I’ll be assigning the leaders of each unit so if you’re chosen. You better not fuck it up.”

You gulped. You knew you were most likely, no way in hell, not going to be chosen for such a position because Bakugou needed your power. But you felt nervousness for the rest of the men in the room. No one wanted to be assigned such a high and trustworthy position, especially if it were for Bakugou’s fleet. The pressure of having to do so well was unnerving and made the inexperienced servants scared out of their lives.

Bakugou glowered at the men, studying each and everyone of their faces. Deciding just by looks and by pure opinion who would be most suited for the job.

“The Ugajin fleet… (y/n)’s dear friend will lead.”

Your dear friend?…. Bernard!?
Your eyes widened and you turned to your friend seated next to you. He was just as shocked as you were. His eyes were saucers and his mouth opened and closed but no words came out.

“Wait-” But Bakugou was quick to interrupt you. He knew you were bound to say something and he knew exactly how to counter you.

“Bernard here, volunteered himself as a lead position if one were ever needed. And my decision is final. No take backs.”

“But-”

“Thank you so much your majesty!” your head snapped back to your friend. Bernard bowed down to a 90 degree angle, and a smile plastered on his face. “I’ll do my best!”

Surprised would be an understatement to the announcement and to such a bold move that your timid – or once timid – friend had just pulled. You were absolutely astonished. But instead of retaliating, you accepted your friend’s decision and gave him a congratulatory pat on the back as he sat back down.

“Moving along, the lead for the Suijin fleet will be Commander Dunceface.”

‘Commander Dunceface?’

Said man seemed to irritate the blonde as his eye slightly twitched and his face furrowed into a deeper scowl at the sound of his name rolling off his tongue. You had no idea of whom this ‘dunceface’ was and your curiosity was piqued once again to whomever it could be. Such an odd name it was.

“Of course I’ll be leading the Fujin fleet. (y/n), you will be coming with me. Their army there is much stronger and with your power our strength is nearly, if not completely, unstoppable.”

You nod, already apprehended the logistics that you were basically just Bakugou’s war weapon since the day he swooped in through your window.

“The rest of you will be in charge of preparing the gear and making sure that all the equipment are in good condition with no defaults. As well as the dragons. They should be extremely healthy and tip top shape. We can’t afford to have any faults.” Bakugou spoke with such a strong tone the whole meeting. It was something much different than when he talked casually. Every word that came out of his mouth and the combination of the complete seriousness in his voice, made him seem like a whole different person. It wasn’t the usual hot-headed, short tempered, foul mouthed brute you, or pretty much anyone else, knew. This was the actual King of Kojin, Bakugou Katsuki.

This new sophisticated way of speaking really caught your attention and made it more enticing to listen. It made you feel like you actually wanted to listen.

“When we have all the preparations, all you servants and the men of the army working in the factories will get into your fleets and take action simultaneously. That way if a kingdom that tries to aid another won’t overlap and outnumber a fleet. So it’s crucial that there be no delays.”

Bakugou’s gaze scans over each face in the room once again. His crimson eyes burning into each soul, along with the last words that embedded itself into everyone’s mind.

“This is a very important battle. A war for power. Kojin Kingdom will rise to the top and we will be victorious.”

~

“Men we know what is at stake, and we will do everything in our power to save (y/n)”

Your father paced back and forth at the front of the large conference room of the (l/n) House. His men, consisting of most of your older male relatives as well as your elder brother, lined up in front of him giving the man of the house their undivided attention.

“What we’ve gathered so far is that she has been taken by Bakugou Katsuki, the King of Kojin. As what we can assume, he was the one Mandell witnessed kidnapping (y/n) from her tower and riding off on his dragon.”

There was a large map of all 4 kingdoms, much identical to Bakugou’s, laid out on a table.

“They were reported last seen here in Fujin Kingdom in the town of Ava.” pointing to a southeast area of the Fujin Kingdom. “The King of Kojin must’ve taken her back to his castle. But he may have had other plans and could have hidden her elsewhere.”

“So what do you suggest we do uncle?” a taller man presumed as your cousin spoke.

“Before we jump to any conclusions, we will take it slow. We know what the King of Kojin is capable of and won’t hesitate to kill. He may threaten to kill (y/n)”

“But father-!”

“I know son. I want to get her back as soon as possible. But please just bear it. Bear with me.”

He took a deep breath, straightening his back and looking into each of the eyes of his men. “I’ve already devised part of our plan. First we will need to confirm if she is being held at the castle or not.”

“And how will we do that brother?” your uncle spoke.

“We will have a spy. One of you will go undercover and stalk their whereabouts. You will sneak to their castle and follow them throughout the day. And report back here about their actions and where (y/n) is being held.”

“So who will be the one to do that?” another quered.

“I will leave that job to (e/b/n).” facing his son. Your brother nods, “I will do my best father.”

“Once we confirm her location, I will contact the All Mighty King for aid.”

“The All Mighty King? Isn’t that aiming a little too high brother? What do you intend on having the All Mighty King for?”

“We will ambush the King of Kojin.”

Since hearing that you were with the King of Kojin, your father’s blood was boiling for days on end. He absolutely hated Bakugou. And that hatred burned deeper than the depths of hell when he somehow got his hands on his dear daughter. His mind flooded with negative thoughts on what in gods world he could be doing to you. The fear of his pure innocent daughter being tainted by that murderous savage loomed over him, and all he could feel was rage and desperation. He would go as far to kill, if it meant getting his daughter back.

He wanted to kill Bakugou Katsuki.

“We will do anything to get (y/n) back.

We’re going to kill the King of Kojin.”

heh so what did you think? writing this chapter was pretty enjoyable because of serious Bakugou. im thinking of doing those february prompts but we’ll see. my birthday was weird and lonely but at least i ate pho.

taglist: @lovecakebacon @spookyscaryskjei @sciencethatshit @seleniumlovelevi

Bakugou slammed his hands on the long wooden table. All the servants, including yourself, had gathered into Bakugou’s conference room. You were all seated along the length of the table with the exception of Bakugou who was standing at the front. blog.name: faketextsfromlastmight
blog.title: Fake texts from last Might
blog.description: Things BNHA characters most definitely never said (sadly).

summary: Kaminari Denki : I'm telling you, Shinsou has a total mancrush on me. Ojiro Mashirao : No way! He's attracted to ME! Kaminari...
body:
Kaminari Denki : I’m telling you, Shinsou has a total mancrush on me.

Ojiro Mashirao : No way! He’s attracted to ME!

Kaminari Denki : Maybe he’s attracted to both of us? I guess we’ll never know.

Ojiro Mashirao : Hey, my tail is a little sore from phys ed… Could you massage it for me?

Kaminari Denki : Here you go. Damn, it’s full of knots… So hard! Want me to go stronger?

Ojiro Mashirao : Thanks. Oh… yes. Oh, you’re getting better at this. Oh, that’s the stuff.

Shinsou Hitoshi : [internal moaning]
